# PyIndore Website - Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js website for the PyIndore Users Group with the following features:

## Project Overview
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript  
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Purpose**: Professional website for Python community in Indore, India

## Completed Setup Steps
- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Project requirements clarified (Next.js + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS)
- [x] Project scaffolded with all necessary files
- [x] Customized with PyIndore branding and content
- [x] Dependencies configured
- [x] Development task created
- [x] Documentation completed

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── app/
│   ├── globals.css
│   ├── layout.tsx
│   └── page.tsx
└── components/
    ├── Header.tsx
    ├── Hero.tsx
    ├── About.tsx
    ├── Events.tsx
    ├── Community.tsx
    ├── Contact.tsx
    └── Footer.tsx
```

## Key Features Implemented
- Professional PyIndore branding with Python colors
- Responsive design for all devices
- Modern UI components with Tailwind CSS
- SEO optimization with proper meta tags
- Event management section
- Community engagement features
- Contact form with multiple inquiry types
- Social media integration placeholders

## Next Steps
To run the project locally, install Node.js and run:
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

The website will be available at http://localhost:3000
